family.quotes: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
family.author: Desmond Tutu

family.quotes: My family is my strength and my weakness.
family.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

family.quotes: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
family.author: George Bernard Shaw

family.quotes: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
family.author: Andre Maurois

family.quotes: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
family.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

family.quotes: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
family.author: Lee Iacocca

family.quotes: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
family.author: Charles R. Swindoll

family.quotes: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood.
family.author: Richard Bach

family.quotes: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
family.author: David Odgen Stiers

family.quotes: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
family.author: Charles Kuralt

family.quotes: Give a little love to a child, and you get a great deal back.
family.author: John Ruskin

family.quotes: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
family.author: Michael J. Fox

family.quotes: Feelings of worth can flourish only and found in a nurturing family.
family.author: Viriginia Satir

family.quotes: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
family.author: Pope John XXII

family.quotes: The family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
family.author: Alex Haley

family.quotes: Family is the most important thing in the world.
family.author: Princess Diana

family.quotes: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
family.author: Barbara Bush

family.quotes: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
family.author: Guy Lafleur

family.quotes: Happy or unhappy, families are all mysterious.
family.author: Gloria Steinem

family.quotes: The family is one of nature's masterpiece.
family.author: George Santayana

family.quotes: A family is a risky venture, because the greater the love, the greater the loss.. That's the trade-off. But I'll take it all.
family.author: Brad Pitt

family.quotes: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
family.author: Jerry Seinfeld

family.quotes: The foundation of family- that's where it all begins for me.
family.author: Faith Hill

family.quotes: The family is the test of freedom, because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
family.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

family.quotes: The family is the nucleus of civilization.
family.author: Will Durant

family.quotes: One's family is the most important thing in life. They are the only people who'll be with me.
family.author: Robert Byrd

family.quotes: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
family.author: Willie Stargell

family.quotes: Some of the most important conversations I've ever had occurred at my family's dinner table.
family.author: Bob Ehrlich

family.quotes: I believe the world is one big family, and we need to help each other.
family.author: Jet Li

family.quotes: A man should never neglect his family for business.
family.author: Walt Disney

family.quotes: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
family.author: Anita Baker

family.quotes: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.
family.author: Cary Grant

family.quotes: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, not looking at the past but only to the future.
family.author: LaToya Jackson

family.quotes: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.
family.author: John Oates

family.quotes: The family you come from isn't as important as the family you're going to have.
family.author: Ring Lardner

family.quotes: Having family responsibilities and concerns just has to make you a more understanding person.
family.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

family.quotes: I've always put my family first and that's just the way it is.
family.author: Jamie Lee Curtis

family.quotes: You don't have to give birth to someone to have a family.
family.author: Sandra Bullock

family.quotes: My family comes first. Maybe that's what makes me different from other guys.
family.author: Bobby Darin

family.quotes: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
family.author: Amos Oz

family.quotes: Women's natural role is to be a pillar of the family.
family.author: Grace Kelly

family.quotes: Family, nature and health all go together.
family.author: Olivia Newton John
